website_summaries.verdict: Huge coffee maker that can make 60 oz. of coffee in just 8 min. at the desired temperature.
pros: Includes a traditional-looking glass carafe that sits on a dual-phase heating element to keep the coffee at the proper temperature for up to 100 min
Uses a copper boiling element to keep the water at the precise temperature for optimal brewing results
cons: Capacity may be too large for home use

customer_reviews.title: Glass carafe, Tighten carafe lid, Brew Rite or Bunn filters
customer_reviews.text: Tips 1. Brew Rite or Bunn 12 cup commercial coffee filters. They use a non-chlorine bleach to whiten and are much much more affordable than the Technivorm filters. 2. Glass carafe over metal; metal can impart off odors and flavors, sommeliers and other food tasters will corroborate the material you consume from affects the flavors and aromas of the item. 3. Tighten the lid of the glass carafe to avoid the carafe from leaking. Hold the plastic portion of the lid in one hand and secure the glass carafe with the other. Tighten the lid gently clockwise [righty tighty] to tighten the plastic portion and prevent coffee from leaking under the threading/seal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Temper your Expectations
customer_reviews.text: We have been using a Cuisinart for many years with no real complaint, came into some extra cash and decided to splurge, the verdict? Makes an excellent cup of HOT coffee, is it $250 better than the Cuisinart? Probably not, but I went through one Cuisinart a year, this one should last longer. Overall I'm happy with the Moccamaster, but after reading all the reviews I guess I was expecting some cosmic.coffee experience, and it's just not that, it's coffee. One more thing, 15 Cups? think again, maybe 15 European espresso cups, but plan on 6 American coffee mugs worth and you won't be dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Qball

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a few months
customer_reviews.text: They want you to pay them to repair it. You are better off buying a cheaper machine. I can get a new machine for the cost of the repair. Would not recommend this product in any fashion. Warranty means you can buy repairs and pay the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: J. Genet

customer_reviews.title: poor quality/value
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is a total bust. I bought it in March for our son's birthday gift, and now in October it's stopped working. Very poor experience and quality. He is going to reach out to the company to see if they will warranty/replace it. totally unacceptable. I would not advise buying this unless you just want to waste your money. super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Steffen

customer_reviews.title: No regrets with this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: The best coffee maker we have ever owned. It not only makes the best coffee at home, it makes a statement just sitting in the counter. Guests always asks about it and walks up to it to give it compliments. Sometimes they ask if they can make a pot themselves. We absolutely love this piece of art and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great Brewer bad pot.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the coffee pot leaks when you pour. The pot on the smaller size is all glass up to the spout but this one has a plastic collar and spout. For this kind of money I would expect everything to be perfect. Get the one size down from this one and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: UniquePerspective

customer_reviews.title: Simple done well
customer_reviews.text: We switched to the Moccamaster after our second coffeemaker died within the first year of use--we are absolutely blown away with the quality of the machine and the coffee it produces. It does make coffee on the strong side, so me and my wife add two scoops less than recommended (I know, I know, but its the way we like it!)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity in form, and the coffee simply tastes better
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity in form, and the coffee simply tastes better. These guys got it right; keep the water at the optimum temperature while brewing. Another thing I noticed about the design of this unit is that the aroma from the coffee stays in the coffee. My other coffee maker by comparison, filled the house with the aroma of coffee, but the coffee it produced was lacking in flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Qtr_Note

customer_reviews.title: Proper coffee filter size:
customer_reviews.text: Use the following for proper filter fit. Tried many others before getting the right one. BUNN BCF100-B 100-Count Basket...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same great taste as smaller pot
customer_reviews.text: Coffee tastes just like the coffee from the smaller Technivorm pot I've been using for years -- even at full 60oz water fill. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Master Brew
customer_reviews.text: Sturdily built with simple controls. Makes a great cup of hot coffee. Easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: farmboyWI

customer_reviews.title: Worth the difference to me!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee brewer! Nothing fancy, but even makes my cheap/already ground/store bought coffee taste better! And...unlike the Cephalon trash I chunked, it doesn't LEAK!
customer_reviews.author: John Howard

customer_reviews.title: Delicious coffee
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best coffee and keeps it HOT. Best coffee maker ever.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker for home
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. Brews quickly. We are getting the full flavor of the beans. The brew temperature really does make a difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coffee results
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing coffee from the machine. Appreciate the larger size of the Grand model. Very helpful Amazon customer service over an earlier packaging issue. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Templer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS VERY WELL BREWS IN 8 MIN. HOPE IT ...
customer_reviews.text: WORKS VERY WELL BREWS IN 8 MIN. HOPE IT LASTS FOR A LONG TIME!!!! TIRED OF BUYING CHEAP COFFEE MAKERS
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Want flavor? This is your coffee maker!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast, fast fast! Excellent coffee in under 5 minutes. I highly recommend this maker 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: Incredible machine, makes great hot coffee. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Coffee maker that brews 64 oz. (1.8 liters)
customer_reviews.text: I had held off buying earlier Technivorm coffee makers as they brewed only 40 oz at a time. When I read about the Technivorm Grand, I was ready to buy. My wife and I combined a number of gift cards from Christmas and added some to purchase the Technivorm Grand. It is simple to use, fast to brew, and easy to clean. There are no electronic gadgets to malfunction. The cost is extravagant, but well worth it if you value consistent, excellent coffee.
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: a bitter brew and not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The taste is inconsistent. I've had this thing for 2 months. I follow the directions exactly and make 1 batch daily. Sometimes it tastes ok and other times it's just awful. I use fresh filtered water and fresh ground premium coffee. They say that it's easy to clean. Well not exactly. It's hand wash only, which means extra time and effort and also the use of lots of water to rinse the detergent out. Then it calls for coarse ground coffee and that requires some effort to get the grind right. It's a waste of money, time, effort and water when you never know how it will taste and, more often than not, it is just lousy. Bleh.
customer_reviews.author: Goosetown

customer_reviews.title: GREAT with a caveat.
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best coffee EVER, but there is a drawback. This brewer is designed to make a FULL pot of coffee. It is NOT designed to make 3-4 cups when it is "just you". The 10 cup brewer is designed for that. HOWEVER, if you order a 10 cup basket (v shaped vs. flat bottomed), a separate "arm" and a basket top, you have the best of both worlds...just swap out the parts from 15 to 10 cup when you want to "brew a few". (Parts are about $50). This truly is a great coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: cartecay1

customer_reviews.title: Fresh hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker produces the best cup of coffee I’ve ever had. The temp is spot on, it’s hot fresh and delicious. The ease in use is just that it’s so ease a 5 year old could do it. Cleaning is a breeze. The glass carafe is simple to wash as are the rest of the parts. Small profile on the counter. I guess my phone not wish would be to have a separate switch for the hot plate. Never worried about burnt coffee, irs do good it doesn’t sit there.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Paired with a proper burr grinder, this coffee maker will make you a cup of coffee that makes you hesitate to drink coffee anywhere else. Buy a travel mug, because you aren’t going to want to use that Keurig at the office.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST COFFEE MAKER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite things in life. Have had it for months and every time I use it I fall in love with it. Maybe not for everyone but it is the best coffee maker available and I’ve used almost all of them. If I didn’t have this I’d have to go to pour overs. Great temp. Great extraction. I can’t say enough good about the Technivorm Grand Carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal W. Furlong

customer_reviews.title: The pinnacle of home brewing machines
customer_reviews.text: I love the minimalist looks of the machine and it consistently brews quality coffee. A good weekly clean is easy thanks to all the removable pieces. I would definitely recommend this to anyone serious about having proper coffee at home.
customer_reviews.author: Big Kyle 570

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best coffee ever
customer_reviews.text: By far the best coffee maker ever. The coffee comes out very hot! I would have given it a 5 but the biggest issue is the filters. Technivorm sells them but way too expensive. Looking for a permanent basket but can't find one to fit. Have ordered BunnCommercial ones...we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Double Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Returned twice
customer_reviews.text: Returned first one because water reservoir was cracked and broken. Returned second one because the reservoir and carafe were both full of glass shavings. Amazon would not replace it again but then returned the money.
customer_reviews.author: cgc424

customer_reviews.title: Requires too much coffee
customer_reviews.text: Makes excellent coffee but it requires 2.5x as much coffee per pot as a normal 12 cup coffee maker. I’m switching back to a more traditional style.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Super fast, delicious coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love my moccamaster coffee maker, I dunno if there's a huge difference in taste of the coffee that I usually drink... But... Mine came Uber damaged and dirty. For something that's 350, I'm a bit disappointed in how they sent it. So, I just wish their hand put together coffee makers need a little help in being careful....
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Makes amazing coffee
customer_reviews.text: We love our technivorm. Makes delicious coffee. Easy to use. I find the lack of bells and whistles refreshing. Has been holding up well for 6+ months at this point.
customer_reviews.author: RedEye

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffee Maker - Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Makes very good coffee.. I recommend this coffee maker for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Plainfield Guy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We decided to take the plunge and try out the 'expensive' coffee maker after being unsatisfied with many other coffee makers. I absolutely love the Moccamaster! Great flavor to the coffee and keeps it hot! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

product_meta.title: Technivorm 39730 CD Grand 60, oz Brushed, Silver
product_meta.description: The Moccamaster cd Grand Coffee maker is perfect for those who entertain, small offices and Coffee shops. It features a glass carafe and brews A full 60 Ounce pot of Coffee in six minutes. Coffee is then held on our unique hot-plate; which, is engineered with a separate, independent element that rolls heat in to the coffee to ensure an even taste from the first cup to the last drop. The hot-plate has two settings, giving you the choice to hold your coffee between 175° and 185° F, while never burning your Coffee. After 100 minutes, The brewer will automatically turn-off. The CD Grand coffeemaker has a commercial style, flat bottom brew-basket and it is recommended to only brew a full pot of Coffee with this model. All Moccamaster Coffee Brewers are handmade in the Netherlands and backed by an industry leading 5-year.
feature_bullets: Perfectly brewed Coffee Delivered by our copper element and no Pumps
Coffee maker features an auto shut off after 100 minutes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars89 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
